name: ez-explore
description: ## Description An app for travel enthusiasts who don't enjoy the planning aspect involved in traveling, this is a unique and fun to use itenerary builder. The app takes in user input data and uses it to build out an itenerary that matches the interests, tastes, and budget of the individual user.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
